error.message: Call to deprecated function libraries_detect(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763

Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to cpf.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
